name: Glitch (itch) (Timothy)
description:
Glitch

Glitch is a contemplative experience about a glitch wandering in a video game...

Story

Thirty minutes before the end of a game jam, a team decides to add a last minute feature in their game.

Your character wakes up as a glitch in the game's world and wanders around interacting with bugs and glitches around him.

Controls

Xbox One or 360 controller recommended

Controller

Left Stick ⚫ Movement
A or X ⚫Interact

Keyboard

Arrows / WASD ⚫ Movement
Spacebar ⚫Interact

Credits
